template.description: Insert Extension Description and Manager (in interface which extends IExtension)
template.name: extdesc

templates.template: Description<${enclosing_type}> DESCRIPTION = Description.of(${enclosing_type}.class, "${enclosing_project}.${extensionId:var('java.util.String')}", "${elementName:var('java.util.String')}", "${class:var('java.util.String')}"); ExtensionManager<${enclosing_type}> MANAGER = new ExtensionManager<>(DESCRIPTION);
